de:
Instrument of Subscription, Representation and Undertaking / Switzerland, on the terms and conditions laid down in Resolution No. 59 of the Board of Governors entitled "Increase in Authorized Capital Stock and Subscriptions Thereto" 
 - 04-09-1997 - Übereinkommen vom 29. Mai 1990 zur Errichtung der Europäischen Bank für Wiederaufbau und Entwicklung (mit Anlagen und Brief)
en:
Instrument of Subscription, Representation and Undertaking / Switzerland, on the terms and conditions laid down in Resolution No. 59 of the Board of Governors entitled "Increase in Authorized Capital Stock and Subscriptions Thereto" 
 - 04-09-1997 - Agreement establishing the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD)
it:
Instrument of Subscription, Representation and Undertaking / Switzerland, on the terms and conditions laid down in Resolution No. 59 of the Board of Governors entitled "Increase in Authorized Capital Stock and Subscriptions Thereto" 
 - 04-09-1997 - Accordo del 29 maggio 1990 istitutivo della Banca europea per la ricostruzione e lo sviluppo (con All. e lettera)
fr:
Instrument of Subscription, Representation and Undertaking / Switzerland, on the terms and conditions laid down in Resolution No. 59 of the Board of Governors entitled "Increase in Authorized Capital Stock and Subscriptions Thereto" 
 - 04-09-1997 - Accord du 29 mai 1990 portant création de la Banque européenne pour la reconstruction et le développement (avec annexes et lettre)
